title: Project State Preservation, Rollback Procedures, and CR-085 Language Correction

comment:
PRE-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All review criteria satisfied.

FRONTMATTER: title = "Project State Preservation, Rollback Procedures, and CR-085 Language Correction"; revision_summary = "Initial draft" (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1).

STRUCTURE: All 12 required CR sections present per SOP-002 Section 6. Sections 7.4/7.5 (Development Controls / Qualified State Continuity) correctly omitted for document-only CR. Subsection numbering consistent throughout.

PLACEHOLDERS: No prohibited placeholders (TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX, double-curly). Execution-phase square-bracket placeholders correctly present in Sections 10-11.

CONTENT VERIFICATION:
- Section 1 (Purpose): Clearly articulates three bundled concerns (CR-085 language fix, pre/post execution commit repositioning, SOP-005 rollback procedures).
- Section 2 (Scope): Context, Changes Summary, and Files Affected all complete. Five files listed.
- Section 3 (Current State): Verified against effective SOP-004 Section 5 — confirms "QMS repository" language exists and is inaccurate.
- Section 4 (Proposed State): Clear target state for all three concerns.
- Section 5 (Change Description): Six subsections with specific, implementable changes. SOP-004 rewrite, SOP-002 restructuring from 5 to 7 steps, SOP-002 Section 10 cross-reference, TEMPLATE-CR comment block update, SOP-005 Section 7.1.5 insertion, seed alignment.
- Section 6 (Justification): Four points covering accuracy, traceability, gap closure, and history preservation.
- Section 7 (Impact Assessment): Tables match Section 2.3. "None" for other impacts (document-only CR).
- Section 8 (Testing Summary): Verification checklist with six specific items mapping to proposed changes. Appropriate for document-only scope.
- Section 9 (Implementation Plan): Seven EIs with bookend commits (EI-1 pre-execution, EI-7 post-execution). Logical sequence.
- Section 10 (Execution): Seven-row EI table matching plan. Static fields filled, editable fields contain execution-phase placeholders.
- Section 12 (References): SOP-001, SOP-002, SOP-004, SOP-005, CR-085. All valid and relevant.

TECHNICAL ACCURACY: Verified proposed changes against effective SOP-004, SOP-002, SOP-005, and TEMPLATE-CR. CR-085 language ("QMS repository") confirmed present. SOP-005 insertion point (between 7.1.4 and 7.2) confirmed correct. SOP-002 step reordering (release before pre-execution commit) is logically coherent — the commit becomes a formal EI with evidence rather than an informal prerequisite.

FORMATTING: Consistent markdown throughout. Section numbering sequential. No typos or errors found.

TRACEABILITY: CR-085 referenced as predecessor. All SOP cross-references verified.

NO TU ASSIGNMENT REQUIRED: Document-only CR affecting procedural governance documents. No code changes, no domain-specific technical review needed.

POST-REVIEW: COMPLIANT. All post-review criteria per SOP-002 Section 7.3 and SOP-004 Section 10 are satisfied.

PRE-APPROVED CONTENT INTEGRITY: Sections 1-9 unchanged from pre-approved version. No modifications to locked content.

EXECUTION ITEM VERIFICATION (7/7 Pass, 0 Fail, 0 VARs):
- EI-1: Pre-execution commit c481458 recorded. Pass.
- EI-2: SOP-004 updated, now EFFECTIVE v7.0. revision_summary references CR-086. Pass.
- EI-3: SOP-002 updated (Section 7.2 restructured to 7 steps, Section 10 cross-reference added), now EFFECTIVE v12.0. revision_summary references CR-086. Pass.
- EI-4: TEMPLATE-CR updated (PRE-EXECUTION and POST-EXECUTION notes), now EFFECTIVE v7.0. revision_summary references CR-086. Pass.
- EI-5: SOP-005 updated (Section 7.1.5 added), now EFFECTIVE v5.0. revision_summary references CR-086. Pass.
- EI-6: Seed copy aligned with EFFECTIVE TEMPLATE-CR v7.0. Verified frontmatter and execution instructions comment block are identical. Pass.
- EI-7: Post-execution commits recorded: project repo eb71acf, qms-cli submodule 033355b, submodule pointer 65f1dce. Pass.

DOCUMENTATION APPROVED (verified via qms_status):
- SOP-004: EFFECTIVE v7.0 -- CONFIRMED
- SOP-002: EFFECTIVE v12.0 -- CONFIRMED
- TEMPLATE-CR: EFFECTIVE v7.0 -- CONFIRMED
- SOP-005: EFFECTIVE v5.0 -- CONFIRMED
None in DRAFT or IN_REVIEW.

REVISION_SUMMARY TRACEABILITY (verified via direct file read):
- SOP-004: "CR-086: Reposition pre-execution commit as first EI, add post-execution commit as final EI, fix repository language in Section 5"
- SOP-002: "CR-086: Restructure Section 7.2 execution steps, add SOP-005 rollback cross-reference to Section 10"
- TEMPLATE-CR: "CR-086: Update execution instructions with pre/post-execution commit guidance and fix repository language"
- SOP-005: "CR-086: Add Section 7.1.5 rollback procedures for execution branch and main branch scenarios"

SCOPE COMPLETENESS: All 5 files from Section 2.3 addressed. No scope items dropped.

EXECUTION SUMMARY (Section 11): Populated with accurate narrative including all document versions and commit hashes.

BOOKEND COMMITS: Pre-execution (EI-1) commit c481458 and post-execution (EI-7) commit 65f1dce both recorded as formal execution evidence -- consistent with CR-086's own convention.

No deviations from plan. Recommend for post-approval.
